### Slice

- [ ] /plan attached (cfoi.plan.v1 block)
- [ ] /clarify answered (cfoi.clarify.v1)
- [ ] /task checklist posted (cfoi.task.v1)

### Checks

- [ ] Contracts updated + types generated (`npm run gen:contracts`)
- [ ] Seeds updated (`npm run seed:pr`)
- [ ] E2E happy path green in PR env (`npm run test:all`)
- [ ] Risk noted via /risk
